document.text:
From: Ryan Hooper <Ryan.Hooper(ilpa.media> 
To:
„
I 
Subject: [EXTERNAL] US v Maxwell - press query 
Date: Wed, 20 Oct 2021 13:49:49 +0000 
Hello all, 
I  am a journalist with the Press Association in London. 
Is there anyone who might be able to outline whether the trial of US v Ghislaine Maxwell is due to open, as planned, on 
November 29 please? 
Also looking to try and find out whether the defendant is due to give evidence, and how long the trial is listed for. 
Have had no joy getting hold of anyone at the court (212 637 2600). 
Apologies —  I  am sure you have had several of these requests. Please let me know if there is a better person to contact. 
Best 
Ryan Hooper 
Press Association 
(44) 07794 047599 
This email is from the PA Media Group. For more information, see www.pamediagroup.com. This email may 
contain confidential information. Only the addressee is permitted to read, copy, distribute or otherwise use this 
email or any attachments. If you have received it in error, please contact the sender immediately. Any opinion 
expressed in this email is personal to the sender and may not reflect the opinion of the PA Media Group. Any 
email reply to this address may be subject to interception or monitoring for operational reasons or for lawful 
business practices. 
EFTA00016957
